title: Old Upper and lower case magazines
content:
If anyone is interested I have some vintage U&lc magazines on eBay.  
The link is  
 [http://cgi.ebay.co.uk/ws/eBayISAPI.dll?ViewItem&item=140342496717](http://web.archive.org/web/20100201120354/http:/cgi.ebay.co.uk/ws/eBayISAPI.dll?ViewItem&item=140342496717 "http://cgi.ebay.co.uk/ws/eBayISAPI.dll?ViewItem&item=140342496717")
author: Richard Pope

comments.content: Let me know if you have any luck, Richard. I've got a big box of them in my basement that I'd love to sell.
Will do - I am torn myself about selling them but need the space.
Mojo - just to let you know that the magazines didn't sell. Looks as if your box will have to stay in the basement a little longer.

U&lc’s print rum exceeded 100K, so there should be tons of them around. I have to admit that I chucked a two foot high batch of them a couple of years ago (the things a divorce make you do…).

. . .  
Bert Vanderveen BNO
Do you still have them? I might be interested in getting my hands on a few copies.
Cody, I'll email you with the U&lc's I have available. Pop open a nice cold Natty Boh while you're waiting.
